measure.name: build_residential_hpxml
measure.description: Exports residential modeling arguments to HPXML file

argument.name: hpxml_path
argument.description: Absolute/relative path of the HPXML file.

argument.name: schedules_output_path
argument.description: Absolute (or relative) path of the output schedules file.

argument.name: weather_station_epw_filename
argument.description: Name of the EPW file.

argument.name: unit_type
argument.description: The type of unit.

argument.name: unit_multiplier
argument.description: The number of actual units this single unit represents.

argument.name: cfa
argument.description: The total floor area of the conditioned space (including any conditioned basement floor area).

argument.name: wall_height
argument.description: The height of the living space (and garage) walls.

argument.name: num_floors
argument.description: The number of floors above grade.

argument.name: aspect_ratio
argument.description: The ratio of the front/back wall length to the left/right wall length, excluding any protruding garage wall area.

argument.name: level
argument.description: The level of the unit.

argument.name: horizontal_location
argument.description: The horizontal location of the unit when viewing the front of the building.

argument.name: corridor_position
argument.description: The position of the corridor.

argument.name: corridor_width
argument.description: The width of the corridor.

argument.name: inset_width
argument.description: The width of the inset.

argument.name: inset_depth
argument.description: The depth of the inset.

argument.name: inset_position
argument.description: The position of the inset.

argument.name: balcony_depth
argument.description: The depth of the balcony.

argument.name: garage_width
argument.description: The width of the garage.

argument.name: garage_depth
argument.description: The depth of the garage.

argument.name: garage_protrusion
argument.description: The fraction of the garage that is protruding from the living space.

argument.name: garage_position
argument.description: The position of the garage.

argument.name: foundation_type
argument.description: The foundation type of the building.

argument.name: foundation_height
argument.description: The height of the foundation (e.g., 3ft for crawlspace, 8ft for basement).

argument.name: foundation_ceiling_r
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: foundation_wall_r
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: foundation_wall_distance_to_top
argument.display_name: Foundation: Wall Insulation Distance To Top
argument.description: The distance to the top of the foundation wall insulation.

argument.name: foundation_wall_distance_to_bottom
argument.display_name: Foundation: Wall Insulation Distance To Bottom
argument.description: The distance to the bottom of the foundation wall insulation.

argument.name: foundation_wall_depth_below_grade
argument.description: The depth below grade of the foundation wall.

argument.name: slab_perimeter_r
argument.description: Refers to the nominal R-value of the perimeter insulation.

argument.name: slab_perimeter_depth
argument.description: Refers to the depth of the perimeter insulation.

argument.name: slab_under_r
argument.display_name: Slab: Under Slab Insulation Nominal R-value
argument.description: Refers to the nominal R-value of the under slab insulation.

argument.name: slab_under_width
argument.description: Refers to the width of the under slab insulation. Enter 999 to specify that the under slab insulation spans the entire slab.

argument.name: carpet_fraction
argument.description: Fraction of the carpet.

argument.name: carpet_r_value
argument.description: R-value of the carpet.

argument.name: attic_type
argument.description: The attic type of the building. Ignored if the building has a flat roof.

argument.name: attic_floor_conditioned_r
argument.display_name: Attic: Floor (Adjacent To Conditioned) Insulation Assembly R-value
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: attic_floor_unconditioned_r
argument.display_name: Attic: Floor (Adjacent To Unconditioned) Insulation Assembly R-value
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: attic_ceiling_r
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: roof_type
argument.description: The roof type of the building.

argument.name: roof_pitch
argument.description: The roof pitch of the attic. Ignored if the building has a flat roof.

argument.name: roof_structure
argument.description: The roof structure of the building.

argument.name: roof_ceiling_r
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: roof_solar_absorptance
argument.description: The solar absorptance of the roof.

argument.name: roof_emittance
argument.description: The emittance of the roof.

argument.name: roof_radiant_barrier
argument.description: Specifies whether the attic has a radiant barrier.

argument.name: eaves_depth
argument.description: The eaves depth of the roof.

argument.name: num_bedrooms
argument.description: Specify the number of bedrooms. Used to determine the energy usage of appliances and plug loads, hot water usage, mechanical ventilation rate, etc.

argument.name: num_bathrooms
argument.description: Specify the number of bathrooms.

argument.name: num_occupants
argument.description: Specify the number of occupants. A value of 'auto' will calculate the average number of occupants from the number of bedrooms. Used to specify the internal gains from people only.

argument.name: neighbor_front_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the front (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_back_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the back (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_left_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the left (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_right_distance
argument.description: The minimum distance between the simulated house and the neighboring house to the right (not including eaves). A value of zero indicates no neighbors.

argument.name: neighbor_front_height
argument.description: The height of the front neighbor.

argument.name: neighbor_back_height
argument.description: The height of the back neighbor.

argument.name: neighbor_left_height
argument.description: The height of the left neighbor.

argument.name: neighbor_right_height
argument.description: The height of the right neighbor.

argument.name: orientation
argument.description: The house's azimuth is measured clockwise from due south when viewed from above (e.g., South=0, West=90, North=180, East=270).

argument.name: wall_type
argument.description: The type of the exterior walls.

argument.name: wall_conditioned_r
argument.display_name: Walls: Cavity (Adjacent To Conditioned) Insulation Assembly R-value
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: wall_unconditioned_r
argument.display_name: Walls: Cavity (Adjacent To Unconditioned) Insulation Assembly R-value
argument.description: Refers to the overall R-value of the assembly.

argument.name: wall_solar_absorptance
argument.description: The solar absorptance of the exterior walls.

argument.name: wall_emittance
argument.description: The emittance of the exterior walls.

argument.name: front_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's front facade. Enter 0 if specifying Front Window Area instead.

argument.name: back_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's back facade. Enter 0 if specifying Back Window Area instead.

argument.name: left_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's left facade. Enter 0 if specifying Left Window Area instead.

argument.name: right_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's right facade. Enter 0 if specifying Right Window Area instead.

argument.name: front_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's front facade. Enter 0 if specifying Front Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: back_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's back facade. Enter 0 if specifying Back Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: left_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's left facade. Enter 0 if specifying Left Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: right_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's right facade. Enter 0 if specifying Right Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: window_aspect_ratio
argument.description: Ratio of window height to width.

argument.name: window_ufactor
argument.description: The heat transfer coefficient of the windows.

argument.name: window_shgc
argument.description: The ratio of solar heat gain through a glazing system compared to that of an unobstructed opening, for windows.

argument.name: winter_shading_coefficient_front_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Front Facade Winter Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for heating season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: summer_shading_coefficient_front_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Front Facade Summer Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for cooling season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: winter_shading_coefficient_back_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Back Facade Winter Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for heating season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: summer_shading_coefficient_back_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Back Facade Summer Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for cooling season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: winter_shading_coefficient_left_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Left Facade Winter Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for heating season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: summer_shading_coefficient_left_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Left Facade Summer Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for cooling season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: winter_shading_coefficient_right_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Right Facade Winter Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for heating season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: summer_shading_coefficient_right_facade
argument.display_name: Interior Shading: Right Facade Summer Shading Coefficient
argument.description: Interior shading multiplier for cooling season. 1.0 indicates no reduction in solar gain, 0.85 indicates 15% reduction, etc.

argument.name: overhangs_front_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the front facade.

argument.name: overhangs_back_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the back facade.

argument.name: overhangs_left_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the left facade.

argument.name: overhangs_right_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the right facade.

argument.name: overhangs_depth
argument.description: Depth of the overhang. The distance from the wall surface in the direction normal to the wall surface.

argument.name: front_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's front conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: back_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's back conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: left_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's left conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: right_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's right conditioned roof facade.

argument.name: skylight_ufactor
argument.description: The heat transfer coefficient of the skylights.

argument.name: skylight_shgc
argument.description: The ratio of solar heat gain through a glazing system compared to that of an unobstructed opening, for skylights.

argument.name: door_area
argument.description: The area of the opaque door(s).

argument.name: door_rvalue
argument.description: Refers to the R-value of the doors adjacent to conditioned space.

argument.name: living_ach_50
argument.description: Air exchange rate, in Air Changes per Hour at 50 Pascals (ACH50), for above-grade living space (including conditioned attic).

argument.name: living_constant_ach_natural
argument.display_name: Air Leakage: Above-Grade Living Constant ACH Natural
argument.description: Air exchange rate, in constant natural Air Changes per Hour, for above-grade living space (including conditioned attic).

argument.name: vented_crawlspace_sla
argument.description: Air exchange rate, in specific leakage area (SLA), for vented crawlspace.

argument.name: shelter_coefficient
argument.description: The local shelter coefficient (AIM-2 infiltration model) accounts for nearby buildings, trees, and obstructions.

argument.name: heating_system_type
argument.description: The type of the heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_fuel
argument.description: The fuel type of the heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_heating_efficiency
argument.description: The rated efficiency value of the heating system. AFUE for Furnace/WallFurnace/Boiler. Percent for ElectricResistance/Stove/PortableHeater.

argument.name: heating_system_heating_capacity
argument.description: The output heating capacity of the heating system. If using 'autosize', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heating_system_fraction_heat_load_served
argument.display_name: Heating System: Fraction Heat Load Served
argument.description: The heat load served fraction of the heating system.

argument.name: heating_system_electric_auxiliary_energy
argument.description: The electric auxiliary energy of the heating system.

argument.name: cooling_system_type
argument.description: The type of the cooling system.

argument.name: cooling_system_fuel
argument.description: The fuel type of the cooling system.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_efficiency
argument.description: The rated efficiency value of the cooling system. SEER for central air conditioner. EER for room air conditioner. Ignored for evaporative cooler.

argument.name: cooling_system_cooling_capacity
argument.description: The output cooling capacity of the cooling system. If using 'autosize', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: cooling_system_fraction_cool_load_served
argument.display_name: Cooling System: Fraction Cool Load Served
argument.description: The cool load served fraction of the cooling system.

argument.name: heat_pump_type
argument.description: The type of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_fuel
argument.description: The fuel type of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_heating_efficiency
argument.description: The rated heating efficiency value of the heat pump. HSPF for air-to-air/mini-split. COP for ground-to-air.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_efficiency
argument.description: The rated cooling efficiency value of the heat pump. SEER for air-to-air/mini-split. EER for ground-to-air.

argument.name: heat_pump_heating_capacity
argument.description: The output heating capacity of the heat pump. If using 'autosize', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heat_pump_cooling_capacity
argument.description: The output cooling capacity of the heat pump. If using 'autosize', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: heat_pump_fraction_heat_load_served
argument.display_name: Heat Pump: Fraction Heat Load Served
argument.description: The heat load served fraction of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_fraction_cool_load_served
argument.display_name: Heat Pump: Fraction Cool Load Served
argument.description: The cool load served fraction of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_fuel
argument.description: The backup fuel type of the heat pump.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_heating_efficiency
argument.description: The backup rated efficiency value of the heat pump. Percent for electricity fuel type. AFUE otherwise.

argument.name: heat_pump_backup_heating_capacity
argument.description: The backup output heating capacity of the heat pump. If using 'autosize', the autosizing algorithm will use ACCA Manual S to set the capacity.

argument.name: mini_split_is_ducted
argument.description: Whether the mini-split heat pump is ducted or not.

argument.name: evap_cooler_is_ducted
argument.description: Whether the evaporative cooler is ducted or not.

argument.name: heating_system_flow_rate
argument.description: The flow rate of the heating system.

argument.name: cooling_system_flow_rate
argument.description: The flow rate of the cooling system.

argument.name: hvac_distribution_system_type_dse
argument.display_name: HVAC Distribution: Uses Distibution System Efficiency
argument.description: Whether the HVAC distribution system type is distribution system efficiency.

argument.name: annual_heating_dse
argument.display_name: HVAC Distribution: Annual Heating Distribution System Efficiency
argument.description: The annual heating efficiency of the distribution system.

argument.name: annual_cooling_dse
argument.display_name: HVAC Distribution: Annual Cooling Distribution System Efficiency
argument.description: The annual cooling efficiency of the distribution system.

argument.name: hvac_control_type
argument.description: The control type of the HVAC system.

argument.name: heating_setpoint_temp
argument.description: Specify the heating setpoint temperature.

argument.name: heating_setback_temp
argument.description: Specify the heating setback temperature.

argument.name: heating_setback_hours_per_week
argument.description: Specify the heating setback number of hours per week value.

argument.name: heating_setback_start_hour
argument.description: Specify the heating setback start hour value. 0 = midnight, 12 = noon

argument.name: cooling_setpoint_temp
argument.description: Specify the cooling setpoint temperature.

argument.name: cooling_setup_temp
argument.description: Specify the cooling setup temperature.

argument.name: cooling_setup_hours_per_week
argument.description: Specify the cooling setup number of hours per week value.

argument.name: cooling_setup_start_hour
argument.description: Specify the cooling setup start hour value. 0 = midnight, 12 = noon

argument.name: supply_duct_leakage_units
argument.description: The leakage units of the supply duct.

argument.name: return_duct_leakage_units
argument.description: The leakage units of the return duct.

argument.name: supply_duct_leakage_value
argument.description: The leakage value of the supply duct.

argument.name: return_duct_leakage_value
argument.description: The leakage value of the return duct.

argument.name: supply_duct_insulation_r_value
argument.description: The insulation r-value of the supply duct.

argument.name: return_duct_insulation_r_value
argument.description: The insulation r-value of the return duct.

argument.name: supply_duct_location
argument.description: The location of the supply duct.

argument.name: return_duct_location
argument.description: The location of the return duct.

argument.name: supply_duct_surface_area
argument.description: The surface area of the first supply duct.

argument.name: return_duct_surface_area
argument.description: The surface area of the return duct.

argument.name: mech_vent_fan_type
argument.description: The fan type of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_tested_flow_rate
argument.description: The tested flow rate of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_rated_flow_rate
argument.description: The rated flow rate of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_hours_in_operation
argument.description: The hours in operation of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_total_recovery_efficiency
argument.description: The total recovery efficiency of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_adjusted_total_recovery_efficiency
argument.display_name: Mechanical Ventilation: Adjusted Total Recovery Efficiency
argument.description: The adjusted total recovery efficiency of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_sensible_recovery_efficiency
argument.description: The sensible recovery efficiency of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_adjusted_sensible_recovery_efficiency
argument.display_name: Mechanical Ventilation: Adjusted Sensible Recovery Efficiency
argument.description: The adjusted sensible recovery efficiency of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: mech_vent_fan_power
argument.description: The fan power of the mechanical ventilation.

argument.name: has_whole_house_fan
argument.description: Whether there is a whole house fan.

argument.name: whole_house_fan_rated_flow_rate
argument.display_name: Whole House Fan: Rated Flow Rate
argument.description: The rated flow rate of the whole house fan.

argument.name: whole_house_fan_power
argument.description: The fan power of the whole house fan.

argument.name: water_heater_type_1
argument.description: The type of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_fuel_type_1
argument.description: The fuel type of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_location_1
argument.description: The location of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_tank_volume_1
argument.description: Nominal volume of water heater tank 1. Set to auto to have volume autosized.

argument.name: water_heater_fraction_dhw_load_served_1
argument.display_name: Water Heater 1: Fraction DHW Load Served
argument.description: The dhw load served fraction of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_heating_capacity_1
argument.description: The maximum energy input rating of water heater 1. Set to autosize to have this field autosized.

argument.name: water_heater_energy_factor_1
argument.description: Ratio of useful energy output from water heater 1 to the total amount of energy delivered from the water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_uniform_energy_factor_1
argument.description: The uniform energy factor of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_recovery_efficiency_1
argument.description: Ratio of energy delivered to water heater 1 to the energy content of the fuel consumed by the water heater. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: water_heater_uses_desuperheater_1
argument.description: Whether water heater 1 uses desuperheater.

argument.name: water_heater_standby_loss_1
argument.description: The standby loss of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_jacket_rvalue_1
argument.description: The jacket R-value of water heater 1.

argument.name: water_heater_type_2
argument.description: The type of water heater 2.

argument.name: water_heater_fuel_type_2
argument.description: The fuel type of water heater 2.

argument.name: water_heater_location_2
argument.description: The location of water heater 2.

argument.name: water_heater_tank_volume_2
argument.description: Nominal volume of water heater tank 2. Set to auto to have volume autosized.

argument.name: water_heater_fraction_dhw_load_served_2
argument.display_name: Water Heater 2: Fraction DHW Load Served
argument.description: The dhw load served fraction of water heater 2.

argument.name: water_heater_heating_capacity_2
argument.description: The maximum energy input rating of water heater 2. Set to autosize to have this field autosized.

argument.name: water_heater_energy_factor_2
argument.description: Ratio of useful energy output from water heater 2 to the total amount of energy delivered from the water heater.

argument.name: water_heater_uniform_energy_factor_2
argument.description: The uniform energy factor of water heater 2.

argument.name: water_heater_recovery_efficiency_2
argument.description: Ratio of energy delivered to water heater 2 to the energy content of the fuel consumed by the water heater. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: water_heater_uses_desuperheater_2
argument.description: Whether water heater 2 uses desuperheater.

argument.name: water_heater_standby_loss_2
argument.description: The standby loss of water heater 2.

argument.name: water_heater_jacket_rvalue_2
argument.description: The jacket R-value of water heater 2.

argument.name: hot_water_distribution_system_type
argument.description: The type of the hot water distribution system.

argument.name: standard_piping_length
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Standard Piping Length
argument.description: The length of the standard piping.

argument.name: recirculation_control_type
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Control Type
argument.description: The type of hot water recirculation control, if any.

argument.name: recirculation_piping_length
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Piping Length
argument.description: The length of the recirculation piping.

argument.name: recirculation_branch_piping_length
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Branch Piping Length
argument.description: The length of the recirculation branch piping.

argument.name: recirculation_pump_power
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Recirculation Pump Power
argument.description: The power of the recirculation pump.

argument.name: hot_water_distribution_pipe_r_value
argument.display_name: Hot Water Distribution: Insulation Nominal R-Value
argument.description: Nominal R-value of the insulation on the DHW distribution system.

argument.name: dwhr_facilities_connected
argument.display_name: Drain Water Heat Recovery: Facilities Connected
argument.description: Which facilities are connected for the drain water heat recovery.

argument.name: dwhr_equal_flow
argument.display_name: Drain Water Heat Recovery: Equal Flow
argument.description: Whether the drain water heat recovery has equal flow.

argument.name: dwhr_efficiency
argument.description: The efficiency of the drain water heat recovery.

argument.name: shower_low_flow
argument.display_name: Hot Water Fixtures: Is Shower Low Flow
argument.description: Whether the shower fixture is low flow.

argument.name: sink_low_flow
argument.display_name: Hot Water Fixtures: Is Sink Low Flow
argument.description: Whether the sink fixture is low flow.

argument.name: solar_thermal_system_type
argument.description: The type of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_area
argument.description: The collector area of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_loop_type
argument.description: The collector loop type of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_type
argument.description: The collector type of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_azimuth
argument.description: The collector azimuth of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_tilt
argument.description: The collector tilt of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_rated_optical_efficiency
argument.display_name: Solar Thermal: Collector Rated Optical Efficiency
argument.description: The collector rated optical efficiency of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_collector_rated_thermal_losses
argument.display_name: Solar Thermal: Collector Rated Thermal Losses
argument.description: The collector rated thermal losses of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_storage_volume
argument.description: The storage volume of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: solar_thermal_solar_fraction
argument.description: The solar fraction of the solar thermal system.

argument.name: pv_system_module_type
argument.description: Module type of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_location
argument.description: Location of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_tracking
argument.description: Tracking of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_array_azimuth
argument.description: Array azimuth of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_array_tilt
argument.description: Array tilt of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_max_power_output
argument.description: Maximum power output of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_inverter_efficiency
argument.description: Inverter efficiency of the PV system.

argument.name: pv_system_system_losses_fraction
argument.description: System losses fraction of the PV system.

argument.name: has_clothes_washer
argument.description: Whether there is a clothes washer.

argument.name: clothes_washer_location
argument.description: The space type for the clothes washer location.

argument.name: clothes_washer_integrated_modified_energy_factor
argument.display_name: Clothes Washer: Integrated Modified Energy Factor
argument.description: The Integrated Modified Energy Factor (IMEF) is the capacity of the clothes container divided by the total clothes washer energy consumption per cycle, where the energy consumption is the sum of the machine electrical energy consumption, the hot water energy consumption, the energy required for removal of the remaining moisture in the wash load, standby energy, and off-mode energy consumption. If only a Modified Energy Factor (MEF) is available, convert using the equation: IMEF = (MEF - 0.503) / 0.95.

argument.name: clothes_washer_rated_annual_kwh
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the clothes washer, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_electric_rate
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the clothes washer, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_gas_rate
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the clothes washer, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: clothes_washer_label_annual_gas_cost
argument.display_name: Clothes Washer: Annual Cost with Gas DHW
argument.description: The annual cost of using the system under test conditions. Input is obtained from the EnergyGuide label.

argument.name: clothes_washer_capacity
argument.description: Volume of the washer drum. Obtained from the EnergyStar website or the manufacturer's literature.

argument.name: has_clothes_dryer
argument.description: Whether there is a clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_location
argument.description: The space type for the clothes dryer location.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_fuel_type
argument.description: Type of fuel used by the clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_energy_factor
argument.description: The energy factor of the clothes dryer.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_combined_energy_factor
argument.description: The Combined Energy Factor (CEF) measures the pounds of clothing that can be dried per kWh (Fuel equivalent) of electricity, including energy consumed during Stand-by and Off modes. If only an Energy Factor (EF) is available, convert using the equation: CEF = EF / 1.15.

argument.name: clothes_dryer_control_type
argument.description: Type of control used by the clothes dryer.

argument.name: has_dishwasher
argument.description: Whether there is a dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_energy_factor
argument.description: The energy factor of the dishwasher.

argument.name: dishwasher_rated_annual_kwh
argument.description: The annual energy consumed by the dishwasher, as rated, obtained from the EnergyGuide label. This includes both the appliance electricity consumption and the energy required for water heating.

argument.name: dishwasher_place_setting_capacity
argument.description: The number of place settings for the unit. Data obtained from manufacturer's literature.

argument.name: has_refrigerator
argument.description: Whether there is a refrigerator.

argument.name: refrigerator_location
argument.description: The space type for the refrigerator location.

argument.name: refrigerator_rated_annual_kwh
argument.description: The EnergyGuide rated annual energy consumption for a refrigerator.

argument.name: refrigerator_adjusted_annual_kwh
argument.description: The adjusted annual energy consumption for a refrigerator.

argument.name: has_cooking_range
argument.description: Whether there is a cooking range.

argument.name: cooking_range_fuel_type
argument.description: Type of fuel used by the cooking range.

argument.name: cooking_range_is_induction
argument.description: Whether the cooking range is induction.

argument.name: has_oven
argument.description: Whether there is a oven.

argument.name: oven_is_convection
argument.description: Whether the oven is convection.

argument.name: has_lighting
argument.description: Whether there is lighting.

argument.name: ceiling_fan_efficiency
argument.description: The efficiency rating of the ceiling fan(s) at medium speed.

argument.name: ceiling_fan_quantity
argument.description: Total number of ceiling fans.

argument.name: ceiling_fan_cooling_setpoint_temp_offset
argument.display_name: Ceiling Fan: Cooling Setpoint Temperature Offset
argument.description: The setpoint temperature offset during cooling season for the ceiling fan(s).

argument.name: plug_loads_plug_load_type_1
argument.description: Type of plug load 1.

argument.name: plug_loads_annual_kwh_1
argument.description: The annual energy consumption of plug load 1.

argument.name: plug_loads_frac_sensible_1
argument.description: Fraction of internal gains that are sensible for plug load 1.

argument.name: plug_loads_frac_latent_1
argument.description: Fraction of internal gains that are latent for plug load 1.

argument.name: plug_loads_plug_load_type_2
argument.description: Type of plug load 2.

argument.name: plug_loads_annual_kwh_2
argument.description: The annual energy consumption of plug load 2.

argument.name: plug_loads_frac_sensible_2
argument.description: Fraction of internal gains that are sensible for plug load 2.

argument.name: plug_loads_frac_latent_2
argument.description: Fraction of internal gains that are latent for plug load 2.

argument.name: plug_loads_schedule_values
argument.description: Whether to use the schedule values.

argument.name: plug_loads_weekday_fractions
argument.description: Specify the 24-hour weekday schedule.

argument.name: plug_loads_weekend_fractions
argument.description: Specify the 24-hour weekend schedule.

argument.name: plug_loads_monthly_multipliers
argument.description: Specify the 12-month schedule.
